item.title: Acc hacked. Delete this thread

item.description:

How old are you: 16
Experience in java: months maybe years
Position applying for: Mod/Admin
Why do you want that positon: Very helpful and useful, like a challenge and im friendly i have hosted 2 servers with 100+ and currently working on my own from the base
What could you bring to Lost-Pk: If your stuck with anything you can ask me, i will try to help with any problem
How much time could you spend on this daily: 4hours+
Do you have msn and skype, if not could you get it: ds_trivia@hotmail.com

Sorry about other email, and is this better?
